Cropping is now nondestructive. Added a nondestructive fit fill content scaling option. Improved audio trimming selection tool. The min photo duration is now 0.1 sec. The setting for Imported photos duration is now under the project Settings. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Filmmaker Pro v10.0: We ve completely reworked our rendering engine allowing for smoother transitions and non destructive filtering grading and transforms. This update also lays the ground work for many future improvements that are currently in the works. New holiday music collection. Added 5 new professional grade transitions. Added an Apply to All option for transitions. Filters and effects can now be chained. Added badges that display the number of filters used the number of adjustments used and the number of music loops selected. P.S If you re enjoying Filmmaker Pro please support us by leaving a review on the App Store.

The audio pitch control option is back but is now a universal setting that applies to all media and all projects. Video and audio speed adjustments are now nondestructive and can go up to 4x. We re thrilled to introduce FMP v9.0! We ve completely rethought the app for iPhone! It is now vertical for easy one handed use and offers a lot more space to work with vertical social media videos. We ve also given the app icon a fresh coat of paint and changed the display name on device to FMP. Performance improvements and bug fixes. We hope you enjoy this update and we d love to hear your feedback. You can reach us at support filmmakerproapp.com. With love The FMP Team

Performance improvements and bug fixes.

We re thrilled to introduce Key Frame Animation a hotly requested feature! This update brings a highly sophisticated but super easy to use key frame animation tool! Key frame animation allows multiple custom transforms to be added to an animation stack that is applied to a layer. Make sure to check out the tutorial by press the yellow bulb button on the main projects view. Performance improvements and bug fixes.

We re thrilled to introduce Audio Ducking a hotly requested feature! This update brings a highly sophisticated but yet super intuitive audio ducking tool! Audio ducking allows background music volume to be lowered ducked for specific segments of a video typically when there s speech. Performance improvements and bug fixes.

Added 5 new tip videos. When layers are being repositions they now scrub the video and automatically scroll the timeline. Layers and photo clips durations can now be adjusted in 0.1 sec increments previously 0.5 sec . Videos can now be trimmed to 0.5 sec previously 1 sec . Added an alignment grid for text. Performance improvements and bug fixes.

Voice to Text Recording voice to text now supports on device voice recognition with no time limit requires devices with an A9 processor or later running iOS 13. The caption background no longer shows from start to finish. It is now hidden when there s a pause in the speech of 2 seconds or longer. General improvements and bug fixes.

Voice to Text Recording voice to text now supports on device voice recognition with no time limit requires devices with an A9 processor or later running iOS 13. The caption background no longer shows from start to finish. It is now hidden when there s a pause in the speech of 2 seconds or longer. General improvements and bug fixes.
General improvements and bug fixes.

Up to 4 picture in picture videos can now be rendered simultaneously at any given time. Layers are now pinned to their respective video clips by default. You can now import projects by press the button on the main view. Critical bug fix that caused the app to crash when attempting to import an edited photo on a synched iCloud device. General improvements and bug fixes.

Speech transcription: You can now import audio tracks from videos or import audio files from the Files app. Filmmaker Pro will run speech recognition on the audio file and generate text captions. More efficient rendering of GIF files. An icon indicating the orientation is now added to the thumbnails in the media selection grid view. General improvements and bug fixes.

FMP v7.0 brings an amazing new feature that s been highly requested and is going to make your lives so much easier! Introducing intelligent layer unstacking! Stacked layers are now automatically detected and unstacked when the top one is tapped for easy access to the bottom layers. You no longer have to move the top layers to get to the bottom ones! Once layers have been unstacked tap a layer to select it or long press a layer to reposition it. Version 6.5.1: We re no longer offering individual features unbundled. Instead all PRO features can be unlocked through the purchase of one of the All Access options. Previous purchases can be recovered by pressing the Restore button on the in app purchase view. Version 6.5: We ve worked really hard to bring you a feature that we think you re going to love and is going to make your workflow so much easier! Layers can now be pinned to specific clips! This means that you no longer have to individually reposition layers after inserting new clips changing the position of clips changing the duration of clips deleting clips and or changing transition durations! Best of all this feature is nondestructive! Pinned layers can be unpinned and repositioned at any time. Haptic feedback is now used throughout the app on supported devices . P.S. If you re enjoying Filmmaker Pro please support us by leaving a review on the App Store.

We ve worked really hard to bring you a feature that we think you re going to love and is going to make your workflow so much easier! Layers can now be pinned to specific clips! This means that you no longer have to individually reposition layers after inserting new clips changing the position of clips changing the duration of clips deleting clips and or changing transition durations! Best of all this feature is nondestructive! Pinned layers can be unpinned and repositioned at any time. Haptic feedback is now used throughout the app on supported devices . P.S. If you re enjoying Filmmaker Pro please support us by leaving a review on the App Store.

The duration of photos and layers can now be adjusted in 0.5 sec increments MP4 can now be selected as an export format in the project settings The minimum text font size is now 5 19.2 down from 10 38.5 previously Persistent tips can now be turned off in the project settings Filmmaker Pro ProCam 6 If you have ProCam 6 installed on your device you can now launch it as an alternative camera option. P.S. If you re enjoying Filmmaker Pro please support us by leaving a review on the App Store. Happy Holidays! Love Filmmaker Pro Team

This update brings improvements to project management and navigation An alternative method for repositioning layers on the timeline. Within each respective editing tools menu we ve add a new Reposition feature which allows for the repositioning of layers on the timeline using a slider. This greatly simplifies the process of reposition layers over long durations. We ve made scrubbing through long projects much easier. Long press the rewind button to bring up a quick scrubbing slider. P.S. If you re enjoying Filmmaker Pro please support us by leaving a review on the App Store.

Movie Fonts Collection Unlock 11 fonts inspired by popular Hollywood blockbusters. In app purchase Photos can now be scaled and cropped. Note: this option is not available for previously imported photos. The timeline is now 3x more precise. Extremely short clips can now easily be selected. Clips can now be trimmed to 1 sec. Transitions are now automatically adjusted in response to videos duration changes. Video zoom speed can now be adjusted. Bug fix related to video stabilization.
